pr_title: Fix position of context menu for android 7 devices

timeline.message: Fix position of context menu for android 7 devices

timeline.bodyText: confirming these have been removed since they are same as v-11 values ?
timeline.author: shubham1g5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,36 +4,10 @@
         Base application theme for API 14+. This theme completely replaces
         AppBaseTheme from res/values/styles.xml on API 14+ devices.
     -->
-    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="android:Theme.Holo.Light">
+    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="CommonTheme">
         <!-- API 14 theme customizations can go here. -->
-        <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/cc_neutral_bg</item>

replies.bodyText: We can drop v-11 now actually insted of moving these to v-11 since min supported version is 14.
replies.author: shubham1g5

replies.bodyText: or maybe we can use the v-14 as the default one.
replies.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText: Not sure if I unserstand the difference correctly though won't v-14 will become the default one by itself once we drop v11 ?
replies.author: shubham1g5

replies.bodyText:
We have a different AppBaseTheme style in the current default themes.xml which would never be used, considering we're only supporting v14+ devices.
So, we can just replace the default themes.xml contents with the contents of themes.xml(v-14) instead of maintaining 2 different themes, right?
replies.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText: yup, got it. That does seem like the right behaviour to me. Would definitely love to get rid of the extra theme files.
replies.author: shubham1g5

timeline.message: Remove obselete themes and use v-14 theme as default
Use v-11 dialog style as default
Add missing windowContentOverlay item in BaseTheme
